title: API Gateway on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
description: Getting started with API Gateway on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure - expose a stock response,  HTTP Backend and Serverless Functions.

steps.title: Step 1 - Prepare Fn and OCI CLI
Step 2 - Create your first API Deployment
Step 3 - Expose an HTTP Backend in the API Deployment
Step 4 - Expose a Serverless Function in the API Deployment for public access
